document_data.name: ''Missing Pets''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Missing Pets''''' was a [[potion]] concocted by the [[green hag]] [[Auntie Ethel]] from within her disturbing laboratory beneath the [[Gnarled Teahouse]] of the [[Putrid Bog]].
document_data.Description: The bottle of the potion appeared as if it contained the skittering legs of thousands of little creatures within.
document_data.Powers: Whomever drank from ''Missing Pets'' suddenly became covered in hundreds upon hundreds of tiny [[illusory]] [[spider]]s. While they had no corporeal form, these imaginary arachnids prevented them from fully engaging in combat or dedicating focus to a single task.
document_data.History: Only one bottle of ''Missing Pets'' was known to exist as of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
